# Learn Ukrainian
> A comprehensive, free Ukrainian language curriculum from A1 to C2.

## About
Learn Ukrainian is an open-source language learning platform offering 97+ interactive lessons aligned with CEFR and Ukrainian State Standards 2024. The curriculum covers beginner to mastery levels with grammar explanations, cultural context, and interactive exercises.

## Curriculum Structure

### A1 - Beginner (34 modules)
Cyrillic alphabet and pronunciation, basic phrases and greetings, simple grammar (gender, plurals, basic verbs), numbers, colors, family vocabulary
URL: /docs/a1/

### A2 - Elementary (57 modules)
All 7 Ukrainian grammatical cases, verb aspect basics (perfective/imperfective), comparison and superlatives, daily life vocabulary
URL: /docs/a2/

### B1 - Intermediate (1 modules)
Aspect mastery and motion verbs, complex sentence structures, participles and verbal adverbs, abstract vocabulary and discourse markers
URL: /docs/b1/

### B2 - Upper-Intermediate (1 modules)
Literature and academic writing, professional contexts, register awareness, advanced grammar
URL: /docs/b2/

### C1 - Advanced (2 modules)
Stylistics and registers, nuanced expression, specialized topics, near-native proficiency
URL: /docs/c1/

### C2 - Mastery (2 modules)
Native-level proficiency, literary analysis, professional specialization, complete fluency
URL: /docs/c2/

## Key Features
- Theory-first approach with deep grammar explanations
- Interactive activities (quizzes, fill-in, matching, error correction)
- Cultural immersion with authentic materials
- IPA pronunciation for all vocabulary
- YouTube videos and external resources integrated
- 100% free, no ads, no paywalls

## Technical Details
- Built with Docusaurus
- Open source: github.com/learn-ukrainian/learn-ukrainian.github.io
- Curriculum source in Markdown
- JSON export available for app integration

## Contact
GitHub: https://github.com/learn-ukrainian/learn-ukrainian.github.io

## Quick Links
- Start learning: /docs/a1/
- All levels: /docs/
- GitHub: https://github.com/learn-ukrainian/learn-ukrainian.github.io
